title: EnergyTrack Home Monitor
description: Monitor household energy consumption in real-time using Arduino and display data on a web interface.
introduction: EnergyTrack Home Monitor is an innovative project designed to help homeowners gain insights into their energy usage. By leveraging Arduino and a web interface, this system provides real-time data to promote energy efficiency and cost savings.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The rising costs of energy and increasing awareness of environmental impact motivated us to create a tool that empowers homeowners to monitor and manage their energy consumption effectively. We wanted to bridge the gap between energy usage and user awareness through a user-friendly and accessible solution.

sections.title: Initial Prototype
sections.body: We began by developing a basic prototype using Arduino to collect energy data from household circuits. The initial setup involved sensors to measure current and voltage, which were then processed using a simple algorithm to calculate power consumption. This data was displayed on a small LCD screen for immediate feedback.

sections.title: Web Interface Development
sections.body: To make the data more accessible and visually engaging, we developed a web interface using Python and Flask. The backend handled data processing and storage, while the frontend used React to create interactive charts and graphs. This allowed users to view historical data and track their energy usage patterns over time.

sections.title: Data Accuracy and Calibration
sections.body: Ensuring accurate data collection was a significant challenge. We fine-tuned the sensors and implemented noise filtering algorithms to improve the reliability of the readings. Additionally, we integrated a calibration feature to account for variations in different household electrical systems.

sections.title: Expanding Features
sections.body: We enhanced the system by adding features such as real-time alerts for high energy usage, comparative analysis with previous months, and energy-saving recommendations. The web interface was optimized for mobile devices to ensure accessibility from anywhere.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Our roadmap includes integrating AI-powered insights to predict energy usage patterns and automate energy-saving recommendations. We also plan to expand compatibility with smart home systems and explore renewable energy integration to provide a comprehensive energy management solution.
